item.title: CVE-2023-1209|2024-08-02T05:40:59.882Z -- servicenow -- servicenow%20records
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities exist in ServiceNow records allowing an authenticated attacker to inject arbitrary scripts.
